content: make 3 of these in the amount of time it would take to make a normal scarf great for gift knitting leftovers and small putups of luxury yarn to jazz it up knit it with your favorite stitch pattern knit/purl cables lace on the center stitches instead of garter stitch this is a great pattern for teaching beginners how to knit because it s so brief and gives them just enough practice knitting without losing their interest in what seems like a never-ending project **i do not mind if anyone prints this pattern out and uses it for teaching though i do request that the pattern not be altered in any way shape or form either before or after it is printed ** --------------------------------------------- works best with a springy yarn knit at a loose-ish gauge --------------------------------------------- the pattern pdf is one page and roughly 230 kilobytes latest version of the pattern uploaded august 2 2011
